flow.descriptionCdata:
43ed3cd3-c3fb-4f83-99ce-0890788d0422.228b88c5-681d-434d-8846-3996c40fed38.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 43ed3cd3-c3fb-4f83-99ce-0890788d0422.3109c70a-0084-49d9-b0f5-4ca8e6b81ab0.prompt=Enter a value for date 43ed3cd3-c3fb-4f83-99ce-0890788d0422.3b8ec955-5a34-4d0c-a40d-754202405f6a.description= The PowerOff should be a guest shutdown + power off, or there might be damage to the guest OS if power off abruptly. 43ed3cd3-c3fb-4f83-99ce-0890788d0422.46c78e9d-a6a6-4327-b183-ed4fb5353656.description=
Check the current date and time, and returns a java DateAndTime formatted string of it. If locale is specified, it will return the date and time string based on the locale.Otherwise, default locale will be used.

Inputs\:
localeLang - The locale language for date and time string. For example,  en or ja.
localeCountry - The locale country for date and time string. For example, US or JP. If localeLang is not specified, this input will be ingored.

Result\:
Current date and time.

Responses\:
success - Date/time retrieved successfully.
failure - Date/time could not be retrieved.
43ed3cd3-c3fb-4f83-99ce-0890788d0422.488b8c18-e98f-489e-af80-1bf7acabb73f.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 43ed3cd3-c3fb-4f83-99ce-0890788d0422.545ecef9-d6c2-4d94-ae30-89c42eff2894.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 43ed3cd3-c3fb-4f83-99ce-0890788d0422.5f0dee86-8207-4a34-9f5d-bfbf84474174.description=
This operation checks whether a string matches another string, using a specific matching rule. The "toMatch" input is the string that is checked for matching the "matchTo" expression. 

Inputs\:
    matchType - The type of match to perform.
Valid values\: Exact Match, Contains, Contains Once, Does Not Contain, Match All Words, Match No Words, Regex
Default value\: Exact Match
    toMatch - The string that is checked for matching.
    matchTo - The string to match against.
Example\: If "matchType" is “RegEx”, the "matchTo" input is a regular expression such as\: ^-?\d+(([\.,]\d+)?)+$. 
    ignoreCase - Specifies whether to ignore case when matching or not.
Valid values\: False, True
Default value\: False

Results\:
    returnResult - This is the primary output. It contains the string "Matches" if the "toMatch" string matches the "matchTo" string. Otherwise, it contains the string "Does Not Match".  

Responses\:
    success - The operation completed as stated in the description.
    failure - The operation completed unsuccessfully.
43ed3cd3-c3fb-4f83-99ce-0890788d0422.70a81890-908a-4b4e-8d8f-25a3d3a40a1a.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 43ed3cd3-c3fb-4f83-99ce-0890788d0422.76fb37bb-e48f-4c91-8483-cb1d781d020f.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 43ed3cd3-c3fb-4f83-99ce-0890788d0422.892f6791-b10e-4fad-acdb-2b8588fa47ab.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 43ed3cd3-c3fb-4f83-99ce-0890788d0422.9e24b1ff-e1ab-4cbd-9103-09d442ac9f35.description=
If the input dateFormat is not specified, it converts a date in the format of date/time of OO Central Server's, which is dependant on the Java locale, to a date either in the format of date/time of OO Central Server's or in the format specified in the input outFormat. 

If the input dateFormat is specified, it converts a date in the format in dateFormat to a date either in the format of date/time of OO Central Server's or in the format specified in the input outFormat.

You can use flow "Get Current Date and Time" to check upon the default date/time format.  

For exmaple, if OO Central Server's locale is English, the input dateFormat is empty and the input outFormat is empty, the input date should be in the format of "July 13, 2006 10\:04\:08 AM". If the user specifies dateFormat as "dd-MM-YYYY HH\:mm\:ss", the input date should be in the format of "13-07-2006 10\:04\:08". If the input outFormat is empty, the result will be "July 13, 2006 10\:04\:08 AM". If the input outFormat is "yyyy-MM-dd", the result will be "2006-07-13".


Specify the date format with the following patterns\:

Letter 	Date or Time Component 	Presentation 	Examples
G 	Era designator 	Text 	AD
y 	Year 	Year 	1996; 96
M 	Month in year 	Month 	July; Jul; 07
w 	Week in year 	Number 	27
W 	Week in month 	Number 	2
D 	Day in year 	Number 	189
d 	Day in month 	Number 	10
F 	Day of week in month 	Number 	2
E 	Day in week 	Text 	Tuesday; Tue
a 	Am/pm marker 	Text 	PM
H 	Hour in day (0-23) 	Number 	0
k 	Hour in day (1-24) 	Number 	24
K 	Hour in am/pm (0-11) 	Number 	0
h 	Hour in am/pm (1-12) 	Number 	12
m 	Minute in hour 	Number 	30
s 	Second in minute 	Number 	55
S 	Millisecond 	Number 	978
z 	Time zone 	General time zone 	Pacific Standard Time; PST; GMT-08\:00
Z 	Time zone 	RFC 822 time zone 	-0800

So, for example\: the date "2006-07-10 15\:16\:14.766 PDT" would have the dateFormat "yyyy-MM-dd HH\:mm\:ss.SSS z".

You can also use single quotes (') to avoid text interpretation. The quoted text will simply be copied into the output string during formatting (if present in the outFormat) or matched against the input string during parsing (if present in the dateFormat). For example, the date value "2006-07-10T15\:16\:14.766Z" would have the dateFormat "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH\:mm\:ss.SSS'Z'". 


Inputs\:
date - The date to parse. If the input dateFormat is empty, the date must be in the format of date/time of OO Central Server's, which is dependant on the Java locale. If the input dateFormat is not empty, the date must be in the format specified in the input dateFormat.
dateFormat - The format of the input date. 
outFormat - The format of the output date/time. If it is empty, the output date/time will be in the format of date/time of OO Cental Server's, which is dependant on the Java locale.
outLocaleLang - The locale language for output string. For example,  en or ja.
outLocaleCountry - The locale country for output string. For example, US or JP. 

Responses\:
success - The date was converted.
failure - The date could not be converted.

Result\:
The date in the new format.
43ed3cd3-c3fb-4f83-99ce-0890788d0422.aa3982f2-da62-4b27-b8f9-d05e7e93698a.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 43ed3cd3-c3fb-4f83-99ce-0890788d0422.d78331cc-88a3-43ac-ae33-9c94f4513ef9.description= The PowerOff should be a guest shutdown + power off, or there might be damage to the guest OS if power off abruptly.
flow.name: pc_lc_add_snapshot
